page.title: 04 A FAMILY WEEKEND.
page.content: On Saturday Kerry & I go to my Gran's in Oswestry while Mum & Dad stay at home.We paint the garage,mow the lawn & weed the garden for Grandad.At home Shaun & Gavin play while Mum & Dad do jobs around the house. On Sundays Mum & Dad & the boys come to Oswestry & we go to"The Jib" for lunch. My favourite is lamb,potatoes, carrots & peas with mint sauce. In the afternoon we children play in the paddling pool in the garden. Mum helps to make tea with Grandma & Dad helps to mend Grandad's car.We all have tea on the picnic table in the garden. Kerry sometimes makes super cheese- cake. Then our family go all the way back to Chapel. I enjoy these weekends very much..
